Kashira:
Ōdanshichi (大団七)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Battles of Genji and Heike (Hiragana seisuiki / ひらかな盛衰記)

Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees (Yoshitsune senbonzakura / 義経千本桜)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (Genpei Nunobiki no taki / 源平布引滝)

The Old Tale of Kusunoki (Kusunoki mukashibanashi / 楠昔噺)

The Battle of Sakamoto Castle (Ōmi Genji senjin yakata / 近江源氏先陣館)

The Cherry Trees of the Imperial Palace (Goshozakura horikawa youchi / 御所桜堀川夜討)

The Ridge Pole of the Sanjusangendo Temple (Sanjūsangendō munagi no yurai / 三十三間堂棟由来)

The Twins and the Sumida River (Futago Sumidagawa / 雙生隅田川)

The Battle of Coxinga (Kokusen'ya kassen / 国性爺合戦)

Kiichi's Book of Strategy (Kiichi Hōgen sanryaku no maki / 鬼一法眼三略巻)

Masakiyo's Loyalty (Hachijin shugo no honjō / 八陣守護城)

The Dragon and the Tiger (Ryūko / 龍虎)

The Nine-Tailed Fox (Tamamo no mae asahi no tamoto / 玉藻前曦袂)

The Tycoon's Exploit (Ehon taikōki / 絵本太功記 絵本太功記)
